con:request.con:request: { "model": "demo model", "quantity": "300", "price": "44.00", "tax_class_id": "1", "manufacturer_id": "20", "sku": "demo sku", "product_seo_url": [ { "keyword": "?", "language_id": "1", "store_id": "0" } ], "status": "1", "points": 0, "reward": 0, "image": "", "other_images": [ "" ], "shipping": "1", "stock_status_id": 0, "upc": "", "ean": "", "jan": "", "isbn": "", "mpn": "", "location": "", "date_available": "2017-05-12", "weight": 0, "weight_class_id": 0, "length": 0, "width": 0, "height": 0, "length_class_id": 0, "subtract": 0, "minimum": 0, "sort_order": "", "product_store": [ "0" ], "product_related": [ "34" ], "product_filter": [ "34" ], "product_description": [ { "language_id": "1", "name": "demo name", "description": "Description of the product", "meta_title": "Meta title of the product", "meta_description": "Meta description of the product", "meta_keyword": "demo, keyword, demo2", "tag": "Product's tag, comma separeted" } ], "product_category": [ "1280" ], "product_special": [ { "customer_group_id": "1", "price": "200", "priority": "1", "date_start": "2015-02-23", "date_end": "2019-02-23" } ], "product_discount": [ { "name": "demo name", "customer_group_id": "1", "price": "200", "priority": "1", "quantity": "1", "date_start": "2015-02-23", "date_end": "2019-02-23" } ], "product_attribute": [ { "attribute_id": "16", "product_attribute_description": [ { "text": "demo name", "language_id": "1" } ] } ], "product_option": [ { "type": "radio", "option_id": "11", "required": "1", "product_option_value": [ { "price": "10.00", "price_prefix": "+", "subtract": "1", "points": "0", "points_prefix": "+", "weight": "0", "weight_prefix": "+", "option_value_id": "46", "quantity": "0" } ] } ] }

con:request.name: BulkProducts
con:request.con:request: [ { "model": "demo model", "quantity": "300", "price": "44.00", "tax_class_id": "1", "manufacturer_id": "20", "sku": "demo sku", "product_seo_url": [ { "keyword": "demo-keyword", "language_id": "1", "store_id": "0" } ], "status": "1", "points": 0, "reward": 0, "image": "", "other_images": [ "" ], "shipping": "1", "stock_status_id": 0, "upc": "", "ean": "", "jan": "", "isbn": "", "mpn": "", "location": "", "date_available": "2017-05-12", "weight": 0, "weight_class_id": 0, "length": 0, "width": 0, "height": 0, "length_class_id": 0, "subtract": 0, "minimum": 0, "sort_order": "", "product_store": [ "0" ], "product_related": [ "34" ], "product_filter": [ "34" ], "product_description": [ { "language_id": "1", "name": "demo name", "description": "Description of the product", "meta_title": "Meta title of the product", "meta_description": "Meta description of the product", "meta_keyword": "demo, keyword, demo2", "tag": "Product's tag, comma separeted" } ], "product_category": [ "25" ], "product_special": [ { "customer_group_id": "1", "price": "200", "priority": "1", "date_start": "2015-02-23", "date_end": "2019-02-23" } ], "product_discount": [ { "name": "demo name", "customer_group_id": "1", "price": "200", "priority": "1", "quantity": "1", "date_start": "2015-02-23", "date_end": "2019-02-23" } ], "product_attribute": [ { "attribute_id": "16", "product_attribute_description": [ { "text": "demo name", "language_id": "1" } ] } ], "product_option": [ { "type": "radio", "option_id": "11", "required": "1", "product_option_value": [ { "price": "10.00", "price_prefix": "+", "subtract": "1", "points": "0", "points_prefix": "+", "weight": "0", "weight_prefix": "+", "option_value_id": "46", "quantity": "0" } ] } ] } ]

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent log.info response
def obj = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def token = obj.data.access_token log.info token context.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("Token",token)
def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils( context ) def httpResponseHeaders = context.testCase.testSteps["GetAccessToken"].testRequest.response.responseHeaders def httpStatus = httpResponseHeaders["#status#"] def httpStatusCode = (httpStatus =~ "[1-5]\\d\\d")[0] assert httpStatusCode == "200" log.info("HTTP status code: " + httpStatusCode)

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent log.info response
def obj = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def user_name = obj.data.username log.info user_name
assert user_name == "upskills_admin"

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent log.info response
def obj = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def succStatus = obj.success log.info succStatus
assert succStatus == 1

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent log.info response
def obj = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def user_name = obj.data.username log.info user_name
assert user_name == "upskills_admin"

def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils( context ) def httpResponseHeaders = context.testCase.testSteps["getProductverify"].testRequest.response.responseHeaders def httpStatus = httpResponseHeaders["#status#"] def httpStatusCode = (httpStatus =~ "[1-5]\\d\\d")[0] assert httpStatusCode == "404" log.info("HTTP status code: " + httpStatusCode) log.info httpStatus

con:restRequest.name: AddCategory
AddProducttoStore
con:restRequest.con:request: { "model": "demo model", "quantity": "300", "price": "44.00", "tax_class_id": "1", "manufacturer_id": "20", "sku": "demo sku", "product_seo_url": [ { "keyword": "${#Testcase#keyword}", "language_id": "1", "store_id": "0" } ], "status": "1", "points": 0, "reward": 0, "image": "", "other_images": [ "" ], "shipping": "1", "stock_status_id": 0, "upc": "", "ean": "", "jan": "", "isbn": "", "mpn": "", "location": "", "date_available": "2017-05-12", "weight": 0, "weight_class_id": 0, "length": 0, "width": 0, "height": 0, "length_class_id": 0, "subtract": 0, "minimum": 0, "sort_order": "", "product_store": [ "0" ], "product_related": [ "34" ], "product_filter": [ "34" ], "product_description": [ { "language_id": "1", "name": "demo name", "description": "Description of the product", "meta_title": "Meta title of the product", "meta_description": "Meta description of the product", "meta_keyword": "demo, keyword, demo2", "tag": "Product's tag, comma separeted" } ], "product_category": [ "${#TestCase#subcategory_id}" ], "product_special": [ { "customer_group_id": "1", "price": "200", "priority": "1", "date_start": "2015-02-23", "date_end": "2019-02-23" } ], "product_discount": [ { "name": "demo name", "customer_group_id": "1", "price": "200", "priority": "1", "quantity": "1", "date_start": "2015-02-23", "date_end": "2019-02-23" } ], "product_attribute": [ { "attribute_id": "16", "product_attribute_description": [ { "text": "demo name", "language_id": "1" } ] } ], "product_option": [ { "type": "radio", "option_id": "11", "required": "1", "product_option_value": [ { "price": "10.00", "price_prefix": "+", "subtract": "1", "points": "0", "points_prefix": "+", "weight": "0", "weight_prefix": "+", "option_value_id": "46", "quantity": "0" } ] } ] }
